title: Truce "Within Our Grasp," Says US Envoy On Israel-Hezbollah War
content: US special envoy Amos Hochstein said in Beirut Tuesday that an end to the Israel-Hezbollah war was "now within our grasp" as he met officials to discuss a truce plan largely endorsed by Lebanon.
summary: US special envoy Amos Hochstein said in Beirut Tuesday that an end to the Israel-Hezbollah war was "now within our grasp" as he met officials to discuss a truce plan largely endorsed by Lebanon.

title: Family Of Indian-Origin Woman Found Dead In Car Boot In UK Call For Justice
content: The Delhi-based family of Harshita Brella, the 24-year-old found dead in a car boot in east London recently, have called for justice as the UK police continue to hunt for her husband as a suspect in her murder.
summary: The Delhi-based family of Harshita Brella, the 24-year-old found dead in a car boot in east London recently, have called for justice as the UK police continue to hunt for her husband as a suspect in her murder.

title: Netanyahu Makes Rare Gaza Visit, Says "Hamas Will Never Rule Again"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made a rare visit to Gaza on Tuesday where he said Hamas shall never rule the Palestinian enclave again once the war is over.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made a rare visit to Gaza on Tuesday where he said Hamas shall never rule the Palestinian enclave again once the war is over.

title: Trump Names Howard Lutnick As Commerce Secretary In Key Transition Pick
content: President-elect Donald Trump nominated Howard Lutnick, the co-chair of his transition team, as his commerce secretary on Tuesday -- a choice set to bring a tougher stance on China from the incoming administration.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump nominated Howard Lutnick, the co-chair of his transition team, as his commerce secretary on Tuesday -- a choice set to bring a tougher stance on China from the incoming administration.

title: PM Modi Visits Guyana, Aims To Strengthen Cultural Ties, Energy Links
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi starts a two-day visit on Tuesday to Guyana, the energy-rich nation with strong historic cultural links with India through a large diaspora.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi starts a two-day visit on Tuesday to Guyana, the energy-rich nation with strong historic cultural links with India through a large diaspora.

title: Take Two: Biden Makes It Into G20 Leaders' Photo
content: The first time G20 leaders took their photo together at a summit in Rio they forgot Joe Biden. On Tuesday they had a reshoot -- with the outgoing US president firmly back in the frame.
summary: The first time G20 leaders took their photo together at a summit in Rio they forgot Joe Biden. On Tuesday they had a reshoot -- with the outgoing US president firmly back in the frame.

title: Russia Vows Response After Ukraine Fires Long-Range US Missiles
content: Russia warned on Tuesday that it would respond after Ukraine fired longer-range US missiles at its territory for the first time, as President Vladimir Putin issued a nuclear threat on the 1,000th day of the war.
summary: Russia warned on Tuesday that it would respond after Ukraine fired longer-range US missiles at its territory for the first time, as President Vladimir Putin issued a nuclear threat on the 1,000th day of the war.

title: Israel Offering $5 Million Reward For Each Gaza Hostage Freed: Netanyahu
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Tuesday that Israel was offering a reward of $5 million to anybody who brings out a hostage held in Gaza.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Tuesday that Israel was offering a reward of $5 million to anybody who brings out a hostage held in Gaza.

title: Amid Russia-Ukraine Conflict, Why These Countries Are Preparing For War
content: Several European countries are advising their residents to be ready for war even as Russia and Ukraine witnessed a grim milestone recently - the 1,000th day of conflict.
summary: Several European countries are advising their residents to be ready for war even as Russia and Ukraine witnessed a grim milestone recently - the 1,000th day of conflict.

title: Italian Village Offers $1 Homes To Disappointed US Voters Post-Election
content: An Italian village, Ollolai, offers $1 homes and fast-track opportunities for disappointed US voters seeking a fresh start.
summary: An Italian village, Ollolai, offers $1 homes and fast-track opportunities for disappointed US voters seeking a fresh start.

title: Trump's Policies To Benefit India's IT Sector, Wipro Chairman Explains How
content: Donald Trump's presidency in the United States is going to be "pro-business and pro-growth" and good for the tech services industry, Wipro Executive Chairman Rishad Premji said at an event in Bengaluru on Tuesday.
summary: Donald Trump's presidency in the United States is going to be "pro-business and pro-growth" and good for the tech services industry, Wipro Executive Chairman Rishad Premji said at an event in Bengaluru on Tuesday.

title: At G20 Summit, PM Modi Calls For Efforts Towards A More Sustainable Future
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday urged the G20 grouping to accelerate efforts to ensure a cleaner and more sustainable future for all.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday urged the G20 grouping to accelerate efforts to ensure a cleaner and more sustainable future for all.

title: Amid Souring Ties With India, Canada's Latest Move Inconveniences Fliers
content: Amid growing tension between New Delhi and Ottawa, passengers travelling from Canada to India are being subjected to extra security screening now.
summary: Amid growing tension between New Delhi and Ottawa, passengers travelling from Canada to India are being subjected to extra security screening now.

title: Amid Concerns Of World War 3, Sweden Gives Citizens Survival Tips
content: The 32-page guide offers advice on crisis management, air raid cover, and safeguarding psychological and digital security.
summary: The 32-page guide offers advice on crisis management, air raid cover, and safeguarding psychological and digital security.

title: What Iraq Plans To Do For The 1st Time Since Saddam Hussein's Rule In 1987
content: The Iraqi government has made extensive efforts to ensure the process, scheduled to take two days to complete, is as inclusive and accurate as possible,
summary: The Iraqi government has made extensive efforts to ensure the process, scheduled to take two days to complete, is as inclusive and accurate as possible,

title: Brazil Cops Uncover Military Plot To Kill President Before He Took Office
content: Brazilian police on Tuesday arrested five people, including a member of former President Jair Bolsonaro's cabinet, suspected of involvement in an alleged plan to kill then-President-elect Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva in 2022, days before he took office.
summary: Brazilian police on Tuesday arrested five people, including a member of former President Jair Bolsonaro's cabinet, suspected of involvement in an alleged plan to kill then-President-elect Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva in 2022, days before he took office.

title: Iran's Enriched Uranium Stockpile Over 32 Times The Limit Set In 2015: UN
content: The UN nuclear watchdog on Tuesday said that Iran's estimated stockpile of enriched uranium had reached more than 32 times the limit set in a 2015 accord between Iran and world powers to limit its nuclear programme.
summary: The UN nuclear watchdog on Tuesday said that Iran's estimated stockpile of enriched uranium had reached more than 32 times the limit set in a 2015 accord between Iran and world powers to limit its nuclear programme.

title: Son Of Norway Crown Princess Arrested On Suspicion Of Rape: Report
content: He was taken into custody on Monday in Oslo on a preliminary charge of having sexual intercourse with someone unconscious or unable to resist the act.
summary: He was taken into custody on Monday in Oslo on a preliminary charge of having sexual intercourse with someone unconscious or unable to resist the act.

title: PM Modi Meets Brazilian President, Thanks Him For Hosting G20 Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday met Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and took stock of the full range of bilateral ties while reaffirming India's commitment to improving cooperation in several sectors
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday met Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and took stock of the full range of bilateral ties while reaffirming India's commitment to improving cooperation in several sectors

title: US Won't Change Nuclear Posture: White House After Russia's Move On Nukes
content: The United States was not surprised by Russia's announced change in its nuclear doctrine and does not plan to adjust its own nuclear posture in response, a White House National Security Council spokesperson said on Tuesday.
summary: The United States was not surprised by Russia's announced change in its nuclear doctrine and does not plan to adjust its own nuclear posture in response, a White House National Security Council spokesperson said on Tuesday.
